twytText: How Thomas Tuchel has turned Chelsea around as they return to the scene of Frank Lampard's demise https://t.co/qjlfyQ54hO

The story of a life-threatening injury and a battle to return to the pitch - as told by @Raul_Jimenez9, his family, friends and @wolves team-mates.

Raul Jimenez: Code Red | Streaming now on @BBCiPlayer
